TopicTitle: KSP Twitter- "We've got something planned later today"

Articles.Content: If this is the asteroid day mod then I like the idea but I don't get the emphasis of it. Like if I had KSP running 64x and I had multiplayer in stock KSP and gp2 then yeah but until then I'm againgst it

> 
> The first was that World Cup soccer ball thingy. ARM was a normal update, 0.23.5, not DLC or a mod etc.

Yeah, I was wrong. I deleted the incorrect post, but not fast enough.

New parts location on tech tree:

Advanced Electrics (160): OX-Stat-XL

Science Tech (300): Telescope

Advanced Unmanned Tech (550): HECS-2

Automation (550): High-Gain Antenna

> 
> If this is the asteroid day mod then I like the idea but I don't get the emphasis of it. Like if I had KSP running 64x and I had multiplayer in stock KSP and gp2 then yeah but until then I'm againgst it

This is basically something that RoverDude threw together for them while the core devs kept working on U5. I'll call Squad out on questionable choices regularly, but this isn't really one.

> 
> This is basically something that RoverDude threw together.

It was a joint effort between me, RoverDude, and Kasper.

I had totally misunderstood how this mod worked. It is FUN.

I'm sorry Squad and RoverDude for being so negative about it. I changed my mind.
